metadata.title: CVE-2024-26930 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: qla2xxx: Fix double free of the ha->vp_map pointerCoverity scan reported potential risk of double free of the pointerha->vp_map.  ha->vp_map was freed in qla2x00_mem_alloc(), and again freedin function qla2x00_mem_free(ha).Assign NULL to vp_map and kfree take care of NULL.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
